short_summary: The Depament of Defense purchases an electronic calibration ECAL module
description: This is a supply arraignment open to all supliers, with delivery in 31 days
full_summary:
## Electronic Calibration (ECAL) Module Tender
### Notice of Proposed Procurement
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites potential bidders to submit proposals for the supply of an Electronic Calibration (ECAL) Module under Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC/XXX/HN.

### Tender Description
The purpose of this solicitation is to acquire an ECAL Module that supports the measuring capabilities generated by Vector Network Analyzers. The ECAL Module will be used for calibration purposes.

### Deliverables
* 1 x Keysight 1x N4692D ECAL Module (or equivalent)

### Tendering Procedures
All current holders of Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC/XXX/HN (Stream 2) in the National Capital Region (NCR) are invited to participate in the solicitation.

### Evaluation Criteria
* The lowest priced responsive bid will be recommended for contract award.

### Key Dates
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-23T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-06-28
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-07-31

### Contract Requirements
* The contract will be subject to the terms and conditions of Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC/XXX/HN.
* Deliveries are expected to be completed by July 31, 2023.

### Submission Requirements
* Bidders must provide all information in either English or French.
* Submissions may be made in electronic format.

### Contact Information
* Brooke Monette
* brooke.monette@forces.gc.ca
* (343) 573-7369

### Important Notes
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with bidders.
* This procurement is not subject to a Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement.
* Security requirements are not applicable to this procurement. 

I have followed the government tender guidelines to format the rewritten entry in a clear and concise manner. I have also edited the text to improve its professional tone and language. The entry is under 400 words as per your request. Let me know if you need any further assistance. 

Here are the key changes that were made to the original text:

* Reformatted the text to improve its clarity and readability
* Standardized the language and tone to be more professional
* Removed redundant or unnecessary information
* Improved the formatting to match the government tender guidelines
* Edited the text to ensure it is free of grammatical errors and formatting inconsistencies
